summary: "No Time to Die" is a 2021 spy movie, the 25th in the James Bond series. Daniel Craig plays Bond, who's retired but gets pulled back into action by the CIA to find a missing scientist. He faces a dangerous enemy with deadly technology. The film was directed by Cary Joji Fukunaga and stars familiar faces like LÃ©a Seydoux and Ben Whishaw, along with new actors like Rami Malek. After delays due to changes in directors and the COVID-19 pandemic, it was released in 2021 to positive reviews and made lots of money worldwide. It even won an Oscar for its theme song.
title: No Time to Die
